about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: When changing lanes:
hasPart.assesses: When changing lanes: | When changing lanes: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: When changing lanes, glance over your shoulder to check for traffic in your blind spot. You may need to look several times before changing lanes. You must keep track of what traffic is doing in front of you as well as what traffic is doing in the lane next to you.

comment.text: Rely on the rearview mirror.

suggestedAnswer.text: Look over your shoulder in the direction you plan to move.

comment.text: Look over your shoulder in the direction you plan to move.

suggestedAnswer.text: Rely on the left side mirror.

comment.text: Rely on the left side mirror.

acceptedAnswer.text: Look over your shoulder in the direction you plan to move.

comment.text: Look over your shoulder in the direction you plan to move.

answerExplanation.text: When changing lanes, glance over your shoulder to check for traffic in your blind spot. You may need to look several times before changing lanes. You must keep track of what traffic is doing in front of you as well as what traffic is doing in the lane next to you.

comment.text: When changing lanes: | When changing lanes, glance over your shoulder to check for traffic in your blind spot. You may need to look several times before changing lanes. You must keep track of what traffic is doing in front of you as well as what traffic is doing in the lane next to you.

hasPart.name: This road sign means:
hasPart.assesses: This road sign means: | This road sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Warning signs provide notice to road users of a situation that might not be readily apparent and are usually yellow with black markings. This warning sign tells drivers to be alert to an intersecting side road ahead.

comment.text: All traffic must turn right.
All traffic must go straight.
A side road intersects ahead.
A side road intersects ahead.

answerExplanation.text: Warning signs provide notice to road users of a situation that might not be readily apparent and are usually yellow with black markings. This warning sign tells drivers to be alert to an intersecting side road ahead.

comment.text: This road sign means: | Warning signs provide notice to road users of a situation that might not be readily apparent and are usually yellow with black markings. This warning sign tells drivers to be alert to an intersecting side road ahead.

hasPart.name: When changing lanes on a freeway, you should:

about.name: When changing lanes on a freeway, you should:

hasPart.assesses: When changing lanes on a freeway, you should: | When changing lanes on a freeway, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Signal at least five seconds prior to a changing lanes on a freeway. Always signal when turning left or right, changing lanes, slowing down, or stopping to let other drivers, motorcyclists, bicyclists, and pedestrians know your intentions.

suggestedAnswer.text: Signal for at least five seconds.

comment.text: Signal for at least five seconds.

suggestedAnswer.text: Slow down before you start to change lanes.

comment.text: Slow down before you start to change lanes.

suggestedAnswer.text: Assume there is enough space in the next lane for your vehicle, if you signal first.

comment.text: Assume there is enough space in the next lane for your vehicle, if you signal first.

acceptedAnswer.text: Signal for at least five seconds.

comment.text: Signal for at least five seconds.

answerExplanation.text: Signal at least five seconds prior to a changing lanes on a freeway. Always signal when turning left or right, changing lanes, slowing down, or stopping to let other drivers, motorcyclists, bicyclists, and pedestrians know your intentions.

comment.text: When changing lanes on a freeway, you should: | Signal at least five seconds prior to a changing lanes on a freeway. Always signal when turning left or right, changing lanes, slowing down, or stopping to let other drivers, motorcyclists, bicyclists, and pedestrians know your intentions.

hasPart.name: Which of the following roadways freeze first when wet?

hasPart.assesses: Which of the following roadways freeze first when wet? | Which of the following roadways freeze first when wet? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Bridges and overpasses tend to freeze before the rest of the road does.

comment.text: Bridges and overpasses
Intersections
Tunnels
Bridges and overpasses

answerExplanation.text: Bridges and overpasses tend to freeze before the rest of the road does.

hasPart.name: Which of these statements is true about roadwork zones?

about.name: Which of these statements is true about roadwork zones?

hasPart.assesses: Which of these statements is true about roadwork zones? | Which of these statements is true about roadwork zones? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Reduce your speed and be prepared to slow down or stop for highway equipment. Driving carefully through work zones improves safety for drivers, pedestrians, bicyclists, and road workers.

suggestedAnswer.text: Fines are the same for violations committed in work zones as they are under normal traffic conditions.

comment.text: Fines are the same for violations committed in work zones as they are under normal traffic conditions.

suggestedAnswer.text: You must "Slow for the Cone Zone."

comment.text: You must "Slow for the Cone Zone."

suggestedAnswer.text: Slow down only if you think workers are present.

comment.text: Slow down only if you think workers are present.

acceptedAnswer.text: You must "Slow for the Cone Zone."

comment.text: You must "Slow for the Cone Zone."

answerExplanation.text: Reduce your speed and be prepared to slow down or stop for highway equipment. Driving carefully through work zones improves safety for drivers, pedestrians, bicyclists, and road workers.

comment.text: Which of these statements is true about roadwork zones? | Reduce your speed and be prepared to slow down or stop for highway equipment. Driving carefully through work zones improves safety for drivers, pedestrians, bicyclists, and road workers.

comment.text: Listening to music through a set of dual headphones.
Adjusting your outside mirrors.
Reading a road map.

acceptedAnswer.text: Listening to music through a set of dual headphones.

comment.text: Listening to music through a set of dual headphones.

answerExplanation.text: Listening to music through a set of dual headphones is dangerous and illegal.
